name: Striped Venetian Loafer - Men's
category_hierarchy: Footwear/Men/Casual Shoes & Urban Boots/Casual Shoes & Sneakers

features: SWIMS loafers are made from natural rubber and TPU, requiring the same care as leather
Gently use a sponge and silicone spray to clean, shine and remove scratches
Our loafers are water-friendly, so can be machine washed
To wash, remove the insole and place both in a washing bag
Use normal detergent without fabric softener
